data.message: I'm a trump supporter. Em is my favorite artist of all time. I dont care about what he said because he has his opinion to say so. I love Eminem because he speaks his mind. You can't hate someone for having a different political standpoint. Everyone thinks differently and it's how you choose to act towards that.

replies.message: the cognitive dissonance when liking Trump and Eminem ... to me intellectually it's impossible ... I am with slim shady in that case

I respect your attitude, but I don't understand how anyone would still support Trump.  He's obviously an objectively shitty person, and I think it's gotten pretty painfully clear to Almost everyone how incompetent he truly is.

Honestly it's hypocritical to say it's okay for him to have a different political opinion when his opinion is "fuck you if you don't agree with me". Sounds a bit fascist but it's okay because it's his opinion right?
i think em is wrong, evenif u have a different opinion, u can't tel me fuck...

If you go back to when Em was just starting out, he has made MANY remarks about so many issues.  To say oh, I'm not listening to him anymore cause he spoke about Trump, dam ppl, know your priorities,  everyone has a right to their opinions, keep it moving and put some preparation H on your butt.
